text: La Thành is the Vietnamese form of the Chinese placename Luocheng formerly romanized as Lo-ch'eng. It may refer to: * Long Biên (Chinese: Longbian), within present-day Hanoi * Tống Bình (Chinese: Songping), within present-day Hanoi * Thăng Long, Hanoi proper, particularly ** Đại La, the old fortress around which the city grew up * Other Luochengs within China
title: La Thành
